categories: Category:Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vader's Castle

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vader's Castle 5

Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vader's Castle 5 is the fifth and final issue of the comic book miniseries Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vader's Castle. The comic was written by Cavan Scott, illustrated by Derek Charm and Charles Paul Wilson III, and released on October 31, 2018 by IDW Publishing.

Originally, the issue was intended to be titled The Revenge of Darth Vader, and the story was to feature a thief breaking into Fortress Vader to steal treasures. The thief plot point was ultimately used with the character Hudd in the framing story.
